de.javasoft.swing
Class JYTextField

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          javax.swing.JComponent
              javax.swing.text.JTextComponent
                  javax.swing.JTextField
                      javax.swing.JFormattedTextField
                          de.javasoft.swing.JYTextField
All Implemented Interfaces:
IUIPropertySupport, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.Scrollable, javax.swing.SwingConstants
Direct Known Subclasses:
JYFormattedTextField, JYSearchField
public class JYTextField
extends javax.swing.JFormattedTextField
implements IUIPropertySupport

Extended JTextField/JFormattedTextField component which provides additional features like the ability to add components within the text area and to display an input prompt if no text is set. It's recommended to use this component in case that you want the component to act like a JTextField.

Version:
1.11, 09.12.2010
See Also:
Serialized Form

Constant Field Values
Constructor Detail

JYTextField

public JYTextField()
Constructs a JYTextField. A default model is created, the initial value is null, and the number of columns is set to 0.

JYTextField

public JYTextField(java.lang.String text)
Constructs a JYTextField initialized with the specified text. A default model is created and the number of columns is 0.

Parameters:
text - The text to be displayed, or null.

JYTextField

public JYTextField(int columns)
Constructs a JYTextField with the specified number of columns. A default model is created and the initial string is set to null.

Parameters:
columns - The number of columns to use to calculate the preferred width; if columns is set to zero, the preferred width will be whatever naturally results from the component implementation.

JYTextField

public JYTextField(java.lang.String text,
                   int columns)
Constructs a JYTextField initialized with the specified text and columns.

Parameters:
text - The text to be displayed, or null
columns - The number of columns to use to calculate the preferred width; if columns is set to zero, the preferred width will be whatever naturally results from the component implementation

setEmptyFieldCommittedAsNullValue

public void setEmptyFieldCommittedAsNullValue(boolean b)
When acting as formatted text field - clearing the field leads to restoring the last valid value on commit i.e. focus lost. In case that this property is true an empty field will be handled as null value.

Parameters:
b - True - means empty field will be converted to null value. False - committed input unchanged.
See Also:
isEmptyFieldCommittedAsNullValue()

isEmptyFieldCommittedAsNullValue

public boolean isEmptyFieldCommittedAsNullValue()
Returns true if an empty field is committed as null value.

Returns:
True if an empty field is handled as null value.
See Also:
setEmptyFieldCommittedAsNullValue(boolean)

setPromptStrategy

public void setPromptStrategy(JYTextField.PromptStrategy strategy)
Specifies the used prompt strategy. NO_TEXT_AND_NO_FOCUS means that the prompt will be displayed only when the component doesn't has the focus and no text is set. NO_TEXT means the prompt will be displayed when no text exists - independent from the focus.

Parameters:
strategy - The prompt strategy.
See Also:
setPromptStrategy(PromptStrategy, boolean), getPromptStrategy(), JYTextField.PromptStrategy

setPromptStrategy

public void setPromptStrategy(JYTextField.PromptStrategy strategy,
                              boolean isUIResource)

public boolean promptStrategyIsUIResource()
Returns true if the promptStrategy property is a UI-resource.

Returns:
True means property is a UI-resource.
